name: A Trip to Yugoslavia: Director's Cut
description: A TRIP TO YUGOSLAVIA is an experimental interactive game with a theme of the old VCR player (with the ability to REWIND, PAUSE and FASTFORWARD).
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: AMD Athlon II Dual-Core M320 2.10 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: ATI Radeon HD 4500 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: Intel Pentium G3420 3.20 GHz Memory: 3 GB RAM Graphics: AMD Radeon HD 6670 DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: Realtek High Definition Audio
